structure.unit: Catastrophic Illness In Children Relief Fund Commission

law.text: [ Text of section effective until November 4, 2012. For text effective November 4, 2012, see below.] The department of public health, in consultation with the division of medical assistance, the division of health care finance and policy and the department of mental health, shall take all necessary steps to maximize and coordinate the availability of federal financial participation under Title XIX of the Social Security Act for the program established by this chapter to the extent that expenditures under such program are considered expenses incurred for medical assistance within the meaning of 42 U.S.C. § 1396d(a). Chapter 111K: Federal financial participation [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 224, Sec. 105 effective November 4, 2012. For text effective until November 4, 2012, see above.] The department of public health, in consultation with the division of medical assistance, the center for health information and analysis and the department of mental health, shall take all necessary steps to maximize and coordinate the availability of federal financial participation under Title XIX of the Social Security Act for the program established by this chapter to the extent that expenditures under such program are considered expenses incurred for medical assistance within the meaning of 42 U.S.C. § 1396d(a).
